statements: SELECT * FROM employee_attendance WHERE employee_id = 101
SELECT employee_id, date, check_in, check_out FROM employee_attendance WHERE employee_id = 102 AND date = '2022-04-28'
SELECT check_in, check_out FROM employee_attendance WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-04-01' AND '2022-04-30'
SELECT * FROM employee_attendance WHERE is_on_leave = TRUE
SELECT employee_id, date, is_on_leave FROM employee_attendance WHERE is_on_leave = FALSE
SELECT employee_id, date, check_in, check_out, is_on_leave FROM employee_attendance;
SELECT employee_id, date, check_in, check_out, is_on_leave FROM employee_attendance WHERE is_on_leave = TRUE;
SELECT employee_id, date FROM employee_attendance WHERE check_in < TIME '09:00:00';
SELECT date, check_in, check_out FROM employee_attendance WHERE check_in > TIME '10:00:00' AND check_out < TIME '18:00:00';
SELECT * FROM employee_attendance WHERE date BETWEEN DATE '2022-01-01' AND DATE '2022-01-31';
SELECT * FROM employees;
SELECT name, position FROM employees WHERE department = 'HR';
SELECT id, name, start_date FROM employees ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT department FROM employees;
SELECT name, clock_in, clock_out FROM employees JOIN attendance_records ON employees.id = attendance_records.employee_id;
SELECT * FROM employees WHERE department = 'Engineering' ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT id, name, department FROM employees WHERE position = 'Manager' ORDER BY id;
SELECT name, position FROM employees WHERE start_date < '2022-01-01' ORDER BY start_date ASC;
SELECT e.id, e.name, a.clock_in, a.clock_out FROM employees e INNER JOIN attendance_records a ON e.id = a.employee_id WHERE a.clock_out IS NULL;
SELECT department, COUNT(*) as total_employees FROM employees GROUP BY department HAVING COUNT(*) > 1 ORDER BY total_employees DESC;
SELECT * FROM employees;
SELECT first_name, last_name, position FROM employees;
SELECT * FROM attendance_records ORDER BY record_date DESC;
SELECT employee_id, leave_date, leave_type FROM leave_records WHERE approved = TRUE;
SELECT first_name, last_name, department FROM employees WHERE position = 'Manager';
SELECT * FROM employees;
SELECT first_name, last_name, department FROM employees;
SELECT employee_id, first_name, position, hire_date FROM employees ORDER BY hire_date;
SELECT employee_id, leave_date, leave_type FROM leave_records WHERE approved = TRUE;
SELECT e.first_name, e.last_name, a.record_date, a.clock_in, a.clock_out FROM employees e INNER JOIN attendance_records a ON e.employee_id = a.employee_id;
SELECT * FROM employees LIMIT 5;
SELECT first_name, last_name, department FROM employees ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT employee_id, first_name FROM employees WHERE department='HR';
SELECT employee_id, join_date FROM employees WHERE join_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT * FROM attendance ORDER BY attendance_date DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT first_name, last_name, department FROM employees ORDER BY department, last_name DESC;
SELECT employee_id, attendance_date, arrival_time, departure_time FROM attendance WHERE attendance_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31' ORDER BY arrival_time ASC;
SELECT * FROM leave_records WHERE leave_type = 'Sick Leave' AND reason LIKE '%flu%' ORDER BY end_date DESC;
SELECT employee_id, salary, pay_date, bonus FROM payroll WHERE salary > 50000 AND bonus <= 10000 ORDER BY salary DESC, bonus ASC;

SELECT e.first_name, e.last_name, p.salary, p.bonus FROM employees e INNER JOIN payroll p ON e.employee_id = p.employee_id WHERE p.pay_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31' ORDER BY e.last_name ASC, p.salary DESC;
SELECT * FROM employees;
SELECT name, position FROM employees WHERE department = 'HR';
SELECT employee_id, clock_in, clock_out FROM attendance WHERE date = '2022-03-15';
SELECT * FROM leaves ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT employee_id, amount FROM payroll WHERE year = 2022 AND month = 3;
SELECT * FROM employees WHERE position = 'Manager';
SELECT name, department FROM employees WHERE department = 'IT' OR department = 'HR' ORDER BY name DESC;

SELECT attendance.employee_id, DATE_FORMAT(date, '%Y-%m-%d') AS attendance_date, TIME_FORMAT(clock_in, '%H:%i') AS clock_in_time, TIME_FORMAT(clock_out, '%H:%i') AS clock_out_time FROM attendance JOIN employees ON attendance.employee_id = employees.employee_id WHERE DATE = CURDATE() ORDER BY clock_in DESC;
SELECT leave_id, reason FROM leaves WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' AND reason LIKE '%medical%' ORDER BY start_date ASC;
SELECT e.name AS employee_name, p.month, p.year, p.amount FROM employees e JOIN payroll p ON e.employee_id = p.employee_id WHERE p.amount > 5000 ORDER BY p.month, p.year ASC;
